She told me that she had written a story about our relationship and submitted it to Penthouse Letters magazine. I was stunned, but also flattered. I couldn't wait to read it. When the magazine arrived, I opened it to find the story. It was even better than I expected. It was a beautiful love story that capture our relationship perfectly. I was so proud and happy that I had to read it out loud to her. She smiled and said that she had been planning to surprise me with something even better. Again, I was amazed by her. She had me read the story again and then told me that she had written one more chapter. She had sent the story to Penthouse Letters magazine, and they had accepted it. It was a great feeling, knowing that our story was going to be shared with the world.
